alert.note: Alert for Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 1:29PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Rapides and east central Vernon Parishes through 215 PM CST... At 128 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Sieper, or near Hineston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of central Rapides and east central Vernon Parishes. This includes Interstate 49 between mile markers 83 and 103. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
